title: Smile Foundation participates in Airtel Delhi Half Marathon
description:
“Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better than you found it.”

With the cause of supporting the education of less-privileged children, Smile Foundation with support of various corporate supporters participated in the Airtel Delhi Half Marathon organized on the 20th of October 2019. Excited and full of energy, around 400 participants became a part of this noble cause.

Education is not only a ladder of opportunity but also an investment in our future. The enthusiasm of employees from three corporates- Schindler India, IHS Markit and R1 RCM -was a sight to behold. With placards in their hands, they ran so children who cannot afford education, may go to school.

“Running for a social cause creates so much of excitement & encouragement in everyone. In support of Every Child In School, we are trying to add the classroom of quality education for underprivileged children.”- said an employee from R1 RCM.

This is what the team of IHS Markit had to say- “Education lays a strong foundation for every dream & is important for everyone. With this goal in mind, we have joined hands with Smile Foundation in support of #EveryChildInSchool campaign. We are running for education of the less-privileged children.”

The marathon turned out a huge success as everyone encouraged and showed unlimited enthusiasm for the education of children. The cause united all of them, and the happiness invigorated each one.
